message: Bob, I'm delighted to offer you this incredible product. It's truly one-of-a-kind, and I believe it will be a valuable asset to you. My initial offer is $1,200,000.  Let's see if we can find a mutually beneficial price.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget allows me to only pay up to $950,000. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. However, $950,000 is significantly below what this product is truly worth. Let's split the difference. I'm willing to come down to $1,075,000. This offer is still very fair, considering the value you'll receive. Let me know your thoughts.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've carefully considered your proposal, but I must respectfully decline. My maximum budget remains at $950,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
